sentences.en: After the singer sang the melodious Jasnine Flower, I an appreciative whistle.
sentences.cn: 歌手唱完优美的茉莉花后我高兴地吹着口哨拍起手来.

sentences.en: Darkness would make him more appreciative of sight; silence would teach him the joys of sound.
sentences.cn: 黑暗会使他更加珍惜视觉, 寂静能使他认识到声音的欢乐.

sentences.en: Darkness would make him more appreciative of sight; silence would tech him the joys of sound.
sentences.cn: 黑暗会使他更珍惜视力, 寂静会教导他享受声音.

sentences.en: Darkness would make him more appreciative of sight.
sentences.cn: 黑暗会使他更加珍惜视力.

sentences.en: He was appreciative of Paul's diligence.
Her boss was very demanding but appreciative of Christina's talents.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂娜的老板非常苛刻，但同时也很欣赏她的才华。

sentences.en: I am appreciative of her kindness.
She looked with appreciative eyes at the powerful young man clipping the hedge.
sentences.cn: 她以欣赏的目光看着那个修剪矮树篱的健壮的年轻人.

sentences.en: She was deeply appreciative of your help.
sentences.cn: 她对你的帮助深表感激.
有欣赏力的观众鼓了掌.

sentences.en: The company was very appreciative of my efforts.
sentences.cn: 公司对我的努力十分赞赏。

sentences.en: There is a murmur of appreciative laughter.
sentences.cn: 发出一阵赞赏的低笑声。

sentences.en: They are always quiet, always cheerful, comfortable, and appreciative of life and its manifold blessings.
sentences.cn: 他们向来稳重,向来安分, 向来愉快 、 舒畅 、 乐天知命.

sentences.en: Tom is genuinely appreciative of all the success he's had.
sentences.cn: 汤姆为他自己获得的所有成功由衷地感激。

sentences.en: We are very appreciative of your efforts to push our products.
sentences.cn: 我们对你方为推销我们的产品所做的努力甚为感激.

trans.tran_en: feeling or showing that you enjoy something or are pleased about it
